enb_long_title: 42nd Session of the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC-42)
sentences: This meeting (27 October - 1 November 2014, Copenhagen, Denmark) considered and finalized the SYR, which integrates the findings from the three IPCC WGs.
The Panel also approved the SYR’s SPM line by line, and adopted the longer SYR section by section.
